name: ghostwriter-hackathon
description: Synthetic Healthcare Data Generator - Optura Hackathon

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run python:dev"
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:python
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:python
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend

author: Hackathon Team
